description: This file defines a LoyaltyService class for fetching loyalty data from an API, along with related data classes Loyalty and LoyaltyHistoryItem for representing loyalty information and history.

classes.name: LoyaltyService
classes.description: Singleton class responsible for fetching loyalty data from the API.

classes.name: Loyalty
classes.description: Represents a user's loyalty information including user ID, points, and history.

classes.name: LoyaltyHistoryItem
classes.description: Represents an individual item in the loyalty history with date, change in points, and reason.

methods.name: LoyaltyService.getLoyalty
methods.description: Fetches loyalty data from the API endpoint and parses it into Loyalty object.

methods.name: Loyalty.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create Loyalty instance from JSON map.

methods.name: LoyaltyHistoryItem.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create LoyaltyHistoryItem from JSON map.
